# Side Knowledge
## Wildering Mirror
Allows you to transmute a pair of eyes, a light bulb, and a crowbar into a Wildering Mirror.
The Wildering Mirror has a high chance to reflect energy weapons such as disablers when it is held.
## Armorer’s Ritual
Allows you to transmute a table and a gas mask to create Eldritch Armor.
Eldritch Armor provides great protection while also acting as a focus when hooded.
## Priest’s Ritual
Allows you to transmute a water tank and a shard of glass into an Eldritch Flask.
This flask contains Omnizine as well as anti-bleeding chemicals.
## Ritual of Knowledge You learn a special ritual that requires 4 random items, ranging from various organs to candles and stun batons.
Performing this ritual grants you 4 knowledge points and resets the items needed.
